lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton is tweaking Republicans who say vaccinations should be optional, writing on social media that vaccines protect the lives of children.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton on Vaccines: 'The Science Is Clear'
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton on Vaccines: 'The Science Is Clear'
